alert.note: Alert for St Lawrence Island and Bering Strait Coast (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 10 at 1:14PM AKST until January 11 at 6:00AM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO 6 AM AKST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Snow and blowing snow expected. The blowing snow will reduce visibility to as low as one half mile at times. Additional snow accumulations of up to one inch expected. Winds could gust as high as 45 mph at times. * WHERE...St Lawrence Island and Bering Strait Coast. * WHEN...From 6 PM this evening to 6 AM AKST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The cold wind chills as low as 25 below zero could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes.
info.instruction: Use caution while traveling, especially in open areas.

area.areaDesc: St Lawrence Island and Bering Strait Coast
